text.div:
This case-insensitive code system http://worldhealthorganization.github.io/smart-hiv/CodeSystem/HIV.Prevention defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
DE1 At elevated risk for HIV acquisitionClient is at elevated risk for HIV acquisition, defined according to country/programme context
DE2 HIV prevention interventionHIV prevention intervention that client accessed
DE3 PrEP serviceClient accessed PrEP services
DE4 OAMTClient accessed opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) services
DE5 NSPClient accessed needle-syringe programme (NSP) services
DE6 STI servicesClient accessed sexually transmitted infection (STI) services
DE7 VMMCClient accessed voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC) services
DE8 OtherClient accessed other HIV prevention services
DE9 Other (specify)Client accessed other HIV prevention services (specify)
DE10 Date accessed HIV prevention interventionDate the client accessed HIV prevention intervention
DE11 HIV status of contactThe HIV status of the client's contact
DE12 HIV-positiveClient's contact is HIV-positive
DE13 HIV-negativeClient's contact is HIV-negative
DE14 UnknownClient does not know contact's HIV status
DE15 Date injecting equipment providedDate client was provided with injecting equipment
DE16 Number of needles-syringes providedNumber of needles-syringes provided to client
DE17 Date OAMT initiatedDate client initiated opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT)
DE18 Date OAMT dose receivedDate client received opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) dose
DE19 Date OAMT take-away dose(s) dispensedDate the client was dispensed opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) take-away dose(s)
DE20 Currently on OAMTClient is currently on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion
DE21 Retained on OAMTClient is retained on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) at reporting date, defined according to country/program to account for medication dispensed and LTFU criterion
DE22 Client being inducted on OAMTClient is currently being inducted on opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT), defined according to country/program
DE23 Client on reducing doses of OAMTClient is current on reducing doses of opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT), defined according to country/program
DE24 Date first maintenance dose receivedFirst date on which client received maintenance dose
DE25 Date of loss to follow-up or OAMT stoppedDate of loss to follow-up or opioid agonist maintenance treatment (OAMT) stopped
DE26 Date medications dispensedDate the client was dispensed medications
DE27 Date medications prescribedDate the client was prescribed medications
DE28 Number of days prescribedDays of medication client has been prescribed
